cachingSystem.classes

Class LRUCache<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • cachingSystem.classes.ObservableCache<K,V>
      • cachingSystem.classes.LRUCache<K,V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cache<K,V>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TimeAwareCache

    public class LRUCache<K,V>
extends ObservableCache<K,V>
    This cache is very similar to the FIFOCache, but guarantees O(1) complexity for the get, put and remove operations.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearAll()
      Clear all the elements from the cache.
      V get(K key)
      Get the value associated with a key, or null if the key does not exist in the cache.

      Return the eldest entry from the cache.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Tells whether or not the cache is empty.
      void put(K key, V value)
      Insert a key value pair in the cache.
      V remove(K key)
      Remove a key if it exists in the cache.
      int size()
      The cache size is defined as the number of stored key-value pairs.
